name: Covid-19 Antivirus
description:
Destroy the virus in this arcade smasher! 

Features controller support!

Note: apparently you cannot kill the corona virus with a mallet. Follow WHO and CDC guidance for your safety and everyone else around you! Also this is a fictional game and doesn't prevent digital viruses on your computer.

Warning: not suitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Please be careful.

Enjoy!
